attributes.action: Support Trumps visit to the uk and his policies on immigration.
attributes.additional_details:
It' s always the loud winging groups of people that get into the news with their distorted views on life as proven by the Brexit vote. 
Lets get one back for the silent majority.
attributes.background: 25 per cent of British people surveyed by YouGov said the Republican presidential frontrunner’s comments amounted to an “appropriate” policy for the United States to purpose.

rejection.details:
President Trump's visit to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178844 
President Trump's immigration policy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/180018
